attributes.action: Teach critical race theory in schools and reverse the banning of this theory
attributes.additional_details: Children are now being deprived of basic education of racism and other prejudice and discrimination, and with this pedagogy children will suffer and lead to more institutional racism if not included in the pedagogy. We as a society are able to see this blatant racism and censorship of important and necessary teachings of racism and prejudice and is being hidden behind sensitive content. So, we need to teach the children of today about racism so the people of the future can thrive.
attributes.background: We need to educate the children of today about the negative effects society has on people of an ethnic minority and bring to light the struggles they may go through in day to day life and to amplify today’s pedagogy to teach the younger generation and improve upon this at an older age, to end racism

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/552737

You could start a petition calling for Critical Race Theory to be added to the National Curriculum, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
